name: Match The Wall!
description:
Break the bricks in order to match the pieces of the wall that are upcoming. The goal is to always have a full wall after hitting new bricks. In order to pass through the next puzzle you will need to Match the Wall!

There are 2 modes: Infinite & Level mode. In the infinite mode you can go for as long as you can and get the highest score that you can. With level mode you are able to progress through levels that progressively get harder and harder.

Have fun, and enjoy Match the Wall today for free!
